content:
every Sunday The Emerald sports staff will collect their favorite quotes from the previous seven days PERIOD Athletes coaches media or anybody with a quote pertaining to Oregon sports can be included PERIOD Below are The Emeralds favorites from the week of March 2March  PERIOD

Baseball

His stuff is so good that if he gets control hes going to be unhittable down the road. second baseman Aaron Payne said of Oregon starting pitcher Matt Krook following Oregons  loss to Ohio State PERIOD

Pressures what you feel when you dont know what youre doing PERIOD We know what were doing so theres no pressure. i know how to pitch I know how to throw strikes so Im really not worried about it. pitcher Jeff Gold said on Wednesdayprior to facing Ohio State He quoted former Oregon football head coach Chip Kelly in the first two sentences. ive never seen a lefty submarine guy in my life before so I wasnt really sure what to expect PERIOD He started me a firstpitch slider and I just swung through it PERIOD I saw him really well and then he came with the fastball and I was just able to stay short and poke it through the middle. right fielder Tyler Baumgartner said about facingSeattles Will Dennis a lefthanded submarine pitcher PERIOD

I think its contagious and its confidence and its going to be dependent on whos up there PERIOD Our guys are really really good young men and they have the will to win  Any time you dont let the game come to you and you force it I think its more difficult to play a very difficult game to begin with. head coach George Horton said about his batters in their  win over Seattle PERIOD

Mens basketball

I just shot it man PERIOD I dont need much space. guard Jason Calliste said about his final shots in Oregons  win over No PERIOD  ranked Arizona PERIOD

I just didnt want to lose PERIOD If we lose it was going to be on me because Im going to shoot it regardless PERIOD So I just put the team on my back. guard Jason Calliste said about sparking a late game run against Arizona PERIOD

We for sure know we can go down there Las Vegas and do it make a run again PERIOD We can make some noise weve got all the weapons weve got a lot of depth weve got to win four games in four days but its definitely possible for us to do. guard Johnathan Loyd said about the possibility of Oregon making another run in this years Pac12 tournament PERIOD

Well most of the time we were doing offensive stuff so they all didnt want to guard me PERIOD But who did I not want to guard E.J PERIOD Singler was dirty PERIOD Never wanted to guard E.J PERIOD He was always slapping you holding you doing something PERIOD So probably E.J. guard Nick Lucenti said about the best players he faced during practice as a member of the scout team PERIOD

Womens basketball

Its really hard for me especially because I have so much love for my coaches and my teammates especially the seniors.So Im really just trying to stay positive PERIOD Im kind of just letting everything come to me right now PERIOD Its really a lot PERIOD Honestly its tough but Ive got to remain positive. forward Jillian Alleyne said following their season concluding  loss to Washington State in the first round of the Pac12 tournament PERIOD

Everything in life takes time to evolve and develop PERIOD Im very proud of what weve done PERIOD I tried to explain to them the team in sports but certainly in life it doesnt always come out the way you want it to PERIOD You say well we really tried and did the right things PERIOD Some people get bigger houses than you and it doesnt mean theyre better PERIOD I think our players and coaches were true to what they do PERIOD Cest la vie. head coach Paul Westhead said following his recently announced retirement PERIOD

Other

They told me you are going to have to prick your finger and take shots for the rest of your life PERIOD As a kid that was really nerve wracking. oregon club cycling member Michael Shelver said about living with type  diabetes PERIOD

It makes my heart really really happy when a beginner takes their own initiative and says Hey Adam PERIOD I want a lesson with you. that just makes me overthemoon happy PERIOD Especially if they do it a couple times a week that means that they want to become a better fencer and thats what the club is about. oregon club fencing team coordinatorHolly Bishop said about working with new members PERIOD

Follow Hayden Kim on Twitter HayDayKim

The Daily Emerald is the news division of Emerald Media Group University of Oregons independent student media organization PERIOD
